panels.title: PF CPU Load by Server - Server (p)
PD Avg Response Time by Operation - Server (p)

targets.expr:
round(
  100 *
    sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{container=~"$server", namespace="$namespace", image!=""}) by (container, pod, namespace)
      /
    sum(container_spec_memory_limit_bytes{namespace="$namespace"} > 0) by (container, pod, namespace)
)
